workflow.name: Smart message batching AI-powered Facebook Messenger chatbot
workflow.description:
# ü§ñ Facebook Messenger Smart Chatbot - Smart Batch, Format & History with n8n Data Table v3
## Version 2026 - Adaptable to n8n v1.113+ and v2.x
**by Nguyen Thieu Toan (Jay Nguyen)**

---
![bananapro20251218T102041765Z1.png](fileId:3772)

## üìñ Overview

A **production-ready, enterprise-grade chatbot solution** for Facebook Messenger built entirely in n8n. Features intelligent message batching, session-aware conversation tracking, multi-page support, and natural AI-powered responses.

**Perfect for:**
- üíº Customer support automation
- üõí E-commerce product inquiries
- üìÖ Appointment scheduling & consultation booking
- üéì Educational assistants & training
- ü§ù Lead qualification & sales automation

**Requirements:** n8n v1.113.0+, Facebook App with Messenger, Google Gemini API key (or compatible LLM)

## üîó Complementary Workflow

**Facebook Messenger Chatbot ‚Äì Smart Human Takeover, Auto Pause & Context-Aware**

Adds intelligent human agent detection and automatic AI pause. When a human joins, AI pauses for configurable duration, then resumes automatically.

**Why combine?**
- Smart Batch (v3): Multi-message batching, spam reduction
- Human Takeover: AI pauses for humans, smooth collaboration

üëâ [Access workflow](https://n8n.io/workflows/11920)

---
![Screenshot_18122025_154423_n8n.nguyenthieutoan.com.jpeg](fileId:3771)

## ‚ö° What's New in Version 3

### **Major Upgrades**

| Feature | Impact |
|---------|--------|
| üè¢ **Multi-Page Support** | Manage multiple pages within one workflow |
| ‚è±Ô∏è **Flexible Timing** | Adjustable wait times instead of fixed delays |
| üîí **Improved Detection** | More reliable identification of system vs. user messages |
| üì¶ **Smart Delivery** | Sequential message handling to avoid overload |
| üßπ **Automatic Cleanup** | Removes outdated records to keep storage efficient |
| üìä **Better Context** | Clear separation of past vs. current sessions |
| üîÑ **Ordered Updates** | Ensures actions run in the right sequence |
| üìù **Simplified Naming** | Clearer labels for easier understanding |

**Architecture Comparison**:  
Previous version had fixed timing, parallel updates, no multi-page handling, and no cleanup.  
New version introduces flexibility, sequential processing, and scalability for real-world use.

---

## üéØ Key Features

- **üîÑ Smart Batching**: Groups consecutive messages within configurable window (default 7s)
- **üß† Session-Aware Context**: Distinguishes old vs. current sessions for temporal awareness
- **üìã Full History**: Stores complete chat logs with both user and page responses
- **üëÄ Natural UX**: "Seen" marker and "Typing..." indicator for human-like feel
- **üéØ AI Integration**: Extensible prompts for domain-specific consulting (Gemini, Groq, or any LLM)
- **üåê Multi-Language**: Handles Vietnamese (anh/ch·ªã/em) with customizable settings
- **üè¢ Multi-Page Ready**: Single workflow serves multiple Facebook Pages simultaneously

**Technical Highlights**: Idempotent processing, timezone-aware timestamps (Asia/Ho_Chi_Minh), Facebook API v24.0 compatible, sequential delivery with rate limiting protection, auto cleanup (keeps last 15 rows)

---

## üèóÔ∏è How It Works

```
### üîÑ General Flow

Reception & Validation ‚Üí Batching & Storage ‚Üí Context Aggregation  
        ‚Üì                      ‚Üì                      ‚Üì  
   Identify input        Store for later use     Combine with history  
   Filter duplicates     Apply short delay       Build conversation context  

                              ‚Üì  

                AI Processing ‚Üí Delivery & Cleanup  
                         ‚Üì                ‚Üì  
                 Generate response     Format & send  
                 Add signals           Maintain records  
                 Ensure continuity     Clean old data  

```

---

## üõ†Ô∏è Setup Guide

### Step 1: Facebook App  
Create app, add Messenger, set webhook, get token, subscribe page  

### Step 2: Data Table  
Prepare tables for messages batching

### Step 3: Workflow  
Import template, set context, link tables, connect AI 

### Step 4: Test  
Activate workflow, send test messages, verify pause/resume  

---

## üë§ About the Author

**Nguyen Thieu Toan (Nguy·ªÖn Thi·ªáu To√†n / Jay Nguyen)**

*AI Automation Specialist | n8n Workflow Expert | Business Optimization Consultant*

**Services**: AI Automation Solutions, n8n Workflow Development, Custom Chatbot Implementation, Training Programs

**Contact**:
- üåê [nguyenthieutoan.com](https://nguyenthieutoan.com)
- üìò [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/nguyenthieutoan)
- üíº [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/nguyenthieutoan)
- üê¶ [X (Twitter)](https://www.x.com/nguyenthieutoan)
- üì∫ [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@NguyenThieuToan)
- üìß me@nguyenthieutoan.com

**GenStaff Company**: [genstaff.net](https://genstaff.net) | contact@genstaff.net

---

## üìÑ License

After purchase, use in commercial/personal projects. No redistribution or resale. Keep author attribution when sharing.

---

**Last Updated**: December 18, 2025 | **Version**: 3.0 | **n8n Compatibility**: v1.123.0+ and v2.0.0+ | **Facebook API**: v24.0

---

**Ready to transform your Facebook Messenger into an intelligent AI assistant? Import this workflow and start automating today! üöÄ**

user.bio: An AI Automation consultant and system builder specializing in business workflow optimization with n8n. As the Founder of GenStaff, Toan empowers teams to automate complex processes using no-code/low-code tools and AI Agents, making operations smarter and more efficient. He actively shares expertise and tutorials about n8n, AI, and automation on his blog and social channels.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
